images.caption:
Javoříčko Caves, the Cave of Giants – decorated with huge combined stalagmites and cascade-like sinter films on the walls of this the largest dome on the tour.
Photo by: P. Rozsíval

Javoříčko Caves rank among the most beautiful and richest caves in the Czech Republic due to the number and diversity of formations.
Photo by: P. Rozsíval

Javoříčko Caves, Detritus Cave – rich soda straws and stalactite decoration of the dome roof
Photo by: P. Rozsíval
